function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited generalizability of findings in laboratory experiments","Impact":"Findings may not be applicable to real-world diverse and complex situations","Mitigation":"Use complementary field studies to validate findings in real-world settings","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, stakeholders","Owner":"Research team, funding organization"},{"Description":"Surrender of control and measurement in field studies","Impact":"Reduced ability to control and measure variables, leading to potential methodological problems","Mitigation":"Careful experimental design and data collection protocols in field studies","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, data collectors","Owner":"Research team, principal investigator"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 pandemic on research validity","Impact":"Unprecedented global circumstances may affect the validity of research findings","Mitigation":"Explicit consideration of pandemic impact on validity and careful examination of findings","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research team, funding organization"}]}
